response.overview: Society has outlawed the erotic writings of Tyrone Montgomery and labeled him insane. Restrained and Tyrone slowly wastes away but his imagination never stops.  We visit the bizarre scenarios that continue to unfold in his brain. His wife and his friends have turned on him but one woman dares to stand beside him and ultimately, save him from a world where all perceived "filth", and the people who create it, have been eradicated.
response.title: More Than A Handful #7
